articles.title: Nebraska's Electoral Shift Faces Strong Opposition Amid Trump Allies' Push
articles.description: A Republican proposal to alter Nebraska's Electoral College votes to a winner-take-all system, favoring Donald Trump, faces opposition from key state Senator Mike McDonnell.
